languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении разговоры стихают. Губернатор почтительно опускает голову.{/n} "Чем могу услужить, Ваша Светлость? Вы уже готовы сообщить свое решение?"

traits.locale_text: {n}При вашем приближении приглушенные разговоры стихают. Губернатор почтительно опускает голову.{/n} "Чем могу услужить, Ваша Светлость? Вы уже готовы сообщить свое решение?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении разговоры стихают. Губернатор почтительно опускает голову.{/n} "Чем могу услужить, Ваша Светлость? Вы уже готовы сообщить свое решение?"

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. Governor bows his head in reverence.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to announce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. Governor bows his head in reverence.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to announce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The Governor bows his head reverently.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The Governor bows his head reverently.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくと会話が静まっていく。総督は敬意を表して頭を下げる。{/n}「お役に立てることはありますか、陛下？もう判断を公表する準備は整いましたか？」
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくと会話が静まっていく。総督は敬意を表して頭を下げる。{/n}「お役に立てることはありますか、陛下？もう判断を公表する準備は整いましたか？」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}你一走近人群，他们就立刻安静下来了。总督低下了头，毕恭毕敬地开了口。{/n}“大人，有什么需要我效劳的吗？您是否已经准备好宣布判决？”
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你一走近人群，他们就立刻安静下来了。总督低下了头，毕恭毕敬地开了口。{/n}“大人，有什么需要我效劳的吗？您是否已经准备好宣布判决？”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Les conversations se taisent au moment où vous approchez. Le gouverneur incline la tête avec respect.{/n} « Que puis-je faire pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ? Seriez-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à rendre votre verdict ? »
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les conversations se taisent au moment où vous approchez. Le gouverneur incline la tête avec respect.{/n} « Que puis-je faire pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ? Seriez-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à prononcer votre verdict ? »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Al acercarte, las conversaciones cesan. El gobernador inclina la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «¿De qué manera puedo servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Está {mf|listo|lista} para pronunciar su veredicto?».
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al acercarte, las conversaciones cesan. El gobernador inclina la cabeza en señal de reverencia.{/n} «¿De qué manera puedo servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Está {mf|listo|lista} para pronunciar su veredicto?».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, verstummen die Gespräche. Der Gouverneur neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Seid Ihr bereit, Euer Urteil zu verkünden?"
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, verstummen die Gespräche. Der Gouverneur neigt ehrfürchtig den Kopf.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}? Seid Ihr bereit, Euer Urteil zu verkünden?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığa yaklaştığında konuşmalar kesiliyor. Vali, başını eğerek seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir buyruğunuz var mıdır? Kararınızı açıklamaya hazır mısınız?"
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach them, the conversations die down. The governor bows his head in deference.{/n} "How may I serve you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}? Are you ready to pronounce your verdict yet?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalığa yaklaştığında konuşmalar kesiliyor. Vali, seni saygıyla selamlamak için başını eğiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir buyruğunuz var mıdır? Kararınızı açıklamaya hazır mısınız?"
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
